The Hall family opened the doors of Halls Chophouse Charleston in 2009, but their pursuit of exceptional hospitality started long before.
About Us Live Music & Events 
at Halls Charleston
Events Our Steaks Steaks 
Premium Cuts. Classic Steakhouse Selections.

Watercress salad, with grape tomatoes

Dining table with leather seats

Interior, dining area

Sliced Tomahawk steak

Grilled T bone steak

Dining area, painting on the wall

Crowded bar area

Reviews

Review by - Tripadvisor

John F:

This was really an amazing culinary experience. Everything I ordered was truly exquisite. If in Charleston, book a table do not think about it. Service was very attentive and made some great suggestions for ordering. Live music was great and not so loud as to take away from an intimate dinner. Fantastic place.

Review by - Tripadvisor

Ashley F:

We had the most amazing meal at Hall's. The service is truly 5-star and the steak was probably the best steak I have ever eaten. We were here to celebrate a special event, and we were treated as such. Our servers took time to give us personalized recommendations and the sommelier helped us select a delicious wine. We would highly recommend and can't wait to dine again. We will be back soon!

Review by - Tripadvisor

Daniel B:

Excellent food, attentive staff, outside seating. We were visiting Charleston on our journey across the country. We wanted a special dinner to celebrate. We choose an early seating on their outside patio, it was perfect. Safe and separate.

Review by - Tripadvisor

John S:

Outstanding Dinner and exceptional service highly recommend the dry aged strip steak and the she crab soup. A dining experience you won’t forget definitely will go back on our next trip to Charleston. Oh and the whiskey bread pudding mouth watering!!!

Review by - Tripadvisor

Bob T:

Halls is always superb and well deserves its recurrent place on the 10 best restaurants list. The service is always fantastic with the best and friendliest staff around town. The variety of steaks available - wet aged, dry aged, etc. - makes it impossible to not find one's favorite here. If your local this should be on your repeat list, if your visiting it should be a not to be missed.
Stop reviews carousel Play reviews carousel

[Page Title: Halls Chophouse- Charleston - Wine]

Wine

Corkage Policy

$45 per 750mL standard bottle, limit 2

$90 per 1.5mL magnum bottle, limit 1

We kindly ask you do not bring a wine currently on our wine list.

Any additional bottles after 2, and wines currently listed are subject to a $90 corkage fee per bottle.

Please click the button below to download the PDF of our wine list.
Download Wine List

[Page Title: Halls Chophouse- Charleston - Events]

Events

5-course Wine Lunch featuring Domaine Pierre Usseglio & Fils

Saturday February 7th

Join us at Halls Chophouse for an exceptional five-course wine lunch featuring Domaine Pierre Usseglio & Fils. Enjoy a guided tour of Châteauneuf-du-Pape, with each course thoughtfully paired to showcase the elegance and depth of these renowned Rhône Valley wines, alongside a curated menu by the Halls Chophouse culinary team.
The Menu 1st Course 
Mussels & Shrimp in Saffron Broth
Wine Pairing: Châteauneuf-du-Pape 1er Cru Pierre Blanc 2021 2nd Course 
Gnocchi with Boar Ragù
Wine Pairing: Châteauneuf-du-Pape 1er Cru Pierre Rouge 2022 3rd Course 
Ganache-Seared Duck Breast with Ratatouille and Pomegranate Reduction
Wine Pairing: Châteauneuf-du-Pape “Réserve des 2 Frères” 2020 4th Course 
Elk Loin with Lyonnaise Potatoes and Fig Mostarda
Wine Pairing: Châteauneuf-du-Pape “Clos No. 18” 2021 Dessert Course 
Cherry Clafoutis
Wine Pairing: Regional Dessert Wine 
Price: $175++ per person for lunch and wine pairing Tickets: Tickets are now available. Please call 843-727-0090 to reserve your seat.

12:00 PM - 03:00 PM
